summary: Teaches the move Toxic, a non-damaging Poison-type move that badly poisons the target, increasing in damage each turn.
typical_users: Defensive or stall-oriented Pokémon (e.g., Blissey, Toxapex, Ferrothorn)
Support Pokémon in doubles (e.g., Clefairy, Amoonguss)
Pokémon seeking to pressure walls or enable poison-based strategies
